message: Import statement for 'com.google.cloud.logging.LogEntry' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'SPECIAL_IMPORTS' group, expecting group 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' on this line.
'java.util.Map' should be separated from previous import group by one line.
Abbreviation in name 'MDCEventEnhancer' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
